creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
description: pink, black and white; gold fringe; printed fabric and embroidered strips and squares; satin stitch outlined with machine stitch designs; lined in blue plain and printed fabric; ties 26 1/2" long; neckband 36 1/2"
title: Under Apron
